title: Do you want to work from the comfort of your home, receive R$6.000 in compensation and up to R$1.820 in benefits? PortÃ¼s Digital is opening a selection process for a home office position!
text:
Attractive opportunity for a senior marketing analyst working from home in an innovative digital market company
A
[Digital Portugues](https://en.clickpetroleoegas.com.br/goodbye-fan-and-air-conditioning%2C-learn-about-radiant-ceilings-and-how-to-cool-your-home-economically/), a reference in recruitment and selection in digital market, is offering a remote vacancy for Senior Marketing Analyst.
This position is essential for the company, which stands out in the evidence-based psychology sector in Brazil.
With an fixed salary of R$6.000, in addition to benefits that can reach $ 1.820 monthly, this is an unmissable opportunity for marketing professionals.
Job Description and Responsibilities
O Senior Marketing Analyst will have as main responsibilities the creation and optimization of sales funnels and automations.
The professional will be responsible for developing strategies that improve customer journeys, with the aim of maximizing campaign results.
Monitoring metrics will be crucial, and the candidate must monitor the performance of campaigns, generating reports that ensure compliance with all KPIs.
Responsibilities include:
- Constant analysis of creatives such as emails, ads and landing pages.
- Transform data into actionable insights for continuous improvement.
- Collaborate with other internal teams to ensure synergy of strategies.
Necessary Skills
Technical requirements
To apply for remote vacancy, the ideal is to have consolidated experience in campaigns digital marketing industry, especially when launching products and services.
Mastery of email marketing tools, such as RD Station e ActiveCampaign, is fundamental.
Additionally, the candidate must be familiar with analysis tools such as Excel, to measure the success of campaigns.
Behavioral requirements
A Digital Portugues highly values behavioral aspects. The candidate must be:
- Extremely responsible and proactive.
- Able to work independently.
- Detailed, as the clarity and impact of each message are essential.
- Resilient, especially during periods of high demand.
Benefits and work model of home office
A remote vacancy offers a series of benefits which make the proposal even more attractive. In addition to the fixed salary of R$6.000, employees have access to:
- Food allowance de R$1.320.
- Home office assistance de R$500.
- Childcare assistance de R$250 per child enrolled in a private daycare center.
Another advantage is the possibility of a annual bonus from to 3 salaries, which motivates the continuous growth of professionals.
Flexibility in home office work
One of the great attractions of this remote vacancy is the flexibility of schedules due to the home office.
A Digital Portugues allows professionals to adjust their schedules, as long as they meet their deliveries with quality and on time.
This model is ideal for those looking for a better balance between personal and professional life.
Opportunity for growth at PortÃ¼s Digital
A Digital Portugues is a company that promotes a dynamic and collaborative environment, where the exchange of ideas and innovation are constant.
Working from home in a company that is at the forefront of digital transformation in the evidence-based psychology market offers an excellent opportunity for growth.
The company also invests in the continuous development of its employees, reflecting its culture of seeking constant improvement.
This translates into multiple opportunities for learning and growth.
